About Me

Hello, I am motivated collage student from georgia. my passion is technology and more precisely web development. i have been studying web development for quite some years now and i have built couple of interesting websites and applications. I am always open to new opportunities and challenges.

My Work

Weather App

Weather App Where you can search weather by any city. it has responsive interface and gives you photo of the city you searched as a background.

Battlefield Game

website where you can play classic battlefield game with smart computer.

Calculator

this is a calculator that i built from scratch. it has responsive design.

Todo App

this Todo application lets you create different projects, create tasks in them with deadline, orginize tasks by priority and sort them by different characteristic.

Library App

this library application lets you save your favourite books or make a list of books you are planning to read.

tic-tac-toe Game

game i have built where you can play game of tic-tac-toe either in pairs or with computer.
